name: DITTO
description:
My first ever game in my first ever jam!

I am aware of it's horrible state and sadly wasn't able to make the game like I invisioned it, I still hope you'll have a few minutes of fun (or frustration) with my game!

Short story:
You control DITTO, a Dna Information Transfer Tool Organism! After your last test run you broke out and are now trying to leave the research facility you have been stuck in for quite some time, now to just get around these stupid clones and somehow trick the doors into letting you pass ...

Help:

  • You get to move twice before the clones (guards/enemies) move
  • WASD for moving around
  • E to open the DNA editing window
    • In here you can click on one letter to select it, then click on another one to switch the two.
  • Abilities (DNA on the right side):
    • TTGC gives you invisibility (slightly op)
    • ATTT gives you one additional turn to move before the clones move
  • . to skip a turn
  • Esc to return from the Door mechanism or DNA editing window
  • Space to return to the main menu
  • To get DNA simply walk up behind a clone and bump into it, but be careful to know it's patrol path so you don't get spottet!

Known Bugs:

  • The last door in Level has has no DNA to match and as such is not completable
  • The detection system can be slightly wonkey (this took me the most time and still isn't perfect - sorry)
